Name: Heroes Arena
About the game: Welcome to Heroes Arena! === FEATURES === 1. Endless Arena 2. Loot Corridor 3. Variety of monsters to defeat 4. Max Player level of 200. 5. Player skins 6. Weapon Shop 7. Potion Shop 8. General Shop 9. A small secret area 10. Steam Achievements === HOW TO PLAY === 1. Use ( W, S, D, A ) to move the player 2. 'Left Mouse Button' to attack 3. 'Right Mouse Button' to use skill 'Big Sword'' 4. 'Space' to use skill 'Spin Attack' 5. '1' to use HP Potion
Meta Title: Heroes Arena: Jul 27, 2018, Victor Corradi and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Heroes Arena? Check out the release date (Jul 27, 2018), developer insights from Victor Corradi, and a complete game summary.
